name: A Maze Dream: the puzzle journey
name_original: A Maze Dream: the puzzle journey
description:
Maze Dream is a mix of a maze and puzzles. In this game, you control a sheep prince with the power of the cloud and your objective is to reach the end of the level and jump over the fence.


JUMP THE FENCE


Your objective is to reach the end of each maze and jump over the fence to move on to the next level.


LEARN FROM YOUR MISTAKES


To err is human, I say sheep... learn from your mistakes and play it again, without life points in the dream world.


MANAGE YOUR POWER CARDS


Use your powers to cross the maze, relax and think a little before acting as your resources are limited.


USE THE ENVIRONMENT


Study and analyze the terrain and how you interact with it, this could be the solution to the puzzle.


UNLOCK SECRETS


In some levels you will find secrets, a magic letter or a key without a lock, collect what you can to unlock new experiences.

Use all your cards to beat the maze
